data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (used_capacity_percent IS NULL OR used_capacity_percent < 80)) AS 'Health Score' FROM netapp_apiservices_volume FACET netapp_apiservices_volume_name
SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_apiservices_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_apiservices_volume FACET netapp_apiservices_aggregate_name

presentation.title: Aggregate Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Aggregate of this Volume

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_apiservices_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_apiservices_volume FACET netapp_apiservices_vserver_name

presentation.title: VServer Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent VServer of this Volume

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_apiservices_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_apiservices_volume FACET cluster_name

presentation.title: Cluster Name Distribution
presentation.notes: The Cluster Name of the Volume.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_apiservices_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_apiservices_volume FACET policy_group

presentation.title: Policy Group Distribution
presentation.notes: The Policy Group of the Volume.

data.nrql: SELECT average(used_capacity_percent) FROM netapp_apiservices_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Used Capacity Percent (Percent)
presentation.notes: The Used Capacity Percent of the Volume.

data.nrql: SELECT average(total_operations) FROM netapp_apiservices_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Total Operations (Operations per Second)
presentation.notes: The Total Operations of the Volume.

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_latency) FROM netapp_apiservices_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Latency (Microseconds)
presentation.notes: The Average Latency of the Volume.
